reference.title: Fetch Language Configuration Item
reference.shortdesc: Fetches the requested configuration item for the specified language of the specified publication.

section.p: Request will fail and return the 404 result model if any of the publication configuration items do not exist, or if the publication is hidden and the user does not have permission to access hidden publications.
